comments.text: Haha, Yoshi, that corgi yoga position is called the 'Comfy Twist', right? 🧘‍♂️😂
Oh my gosh! The cuteness level just broke my phone screen! 🐶❤️ Comfy level 1000, Yoshi!
That's basically me after a long day of work. 😆 Totally feel you, little corgi. Give him a treat from me! 🍖
Angles matter! From this perspective, I'd say your corgi just invented a new way of chilling! 😂❤️ #ComfyGoals
Yoshi, you are single-handedly defining comfort in 2023! Can I join this comfy club? 🛌💤🐾
